body:
All Versions

  • User admin page: Add paging to improve the user experience for clients with a large number of users.
  • Provider Search: Add validation to id\name field to prevent error from occurring when the id number that is entered is too long.

Network360 Only

  • Compare Networks: Change volatility quadrant calculation to use a 30 day average to give a more accurate comparison between frequently and infrequently updated networks.
  • All Provider List Exports: Add latitude and longitude fields.
  • Create List Export: Add distance field for radius searches.

Network360edge Only

  • Assess Markets: Make processing occur offline so that users can leave the page and get an email and popup notifications when the report is ready.
  • Provider Directory Export: Add distance field.
